scripts.build-folder: rm -rf build/ && d2-manifest package.json manifest.webapp && react-scripts build && yarn run manifest && cp -r i18n icon.png build
scripts.build-default: REACT_APP_DHIS2_BASE_URL='' REACT_APP_DHIS2_AUTH='' yarn build-folder && rm -f $npm_package_name.zip && cd build && rm -f manifest_mal.json mal-favicon.ico && zip --quiet -r ../$npm_package_name.zip *

scripts.build-report: REACT_APP_DHIS2_BASE_URL='' REACT_APP_DHIS2_AUTH='' yarn build && gulp build-report
scripts.build: REACT_APP_DHIS2_BASE_URL='' REACT_APP_DHIS2_AUTH='' npx ts-node -P tsconfig-cli.json src/scripts/build.ts
scripts.update-po: yarn extract-pot && for pofile in i18n/*.po; do msgmerge --backup=off -U $pofile i18n/en.pot; done
scripts.mal-manifest: d2-manifest package.json manifest.webapp --manifest.version=$npm_package_reportVersions_mal --manifest.icons.48='mal-icon.png' --manifest.name='NHWA Approval Report' --manifest.description='NHWA Approval Report'
scripts.mal-build-manifest: d2-manifest package.json build/manifest.webapp --manifest.version=$npm_package_reportVersions_mal --manifest.icons.48 mal-icon.png --manifest.name='NHWA Approval Report' --manifest.description='NHWA Approval Report'
scripts.glass-admin-manifest: d2-manifest package.json manifest.webapp --manifest.version=$npm_package_reportVersions_glass_admin --manifest.icons.48='glass-icon.png' --manifest.name='DHIS2 GLASS Admin Maintenance Report' --manifest.description='DHIS2 GLASS Admin Maintenance Report'
scripts.glass-admin-build-manifest: d2-manifest package.json build/manifest.webapp --manifest.version=$npm_package_reportVersions_glass_admin --manifest.icons.48 glass-icon.png --manifest.name='DHIS2 GLASS Admin Maintenance Report' --manifest.description='DHIS2 GLASS Admin Maintenance Report'
